On 16 October, we’re holding the inaugural Music Ally Digital Music Awards in London: a celebration of the creative, inventive work being done by our community.

We’ve got a venue: the Camden Centre. We’ve got sponsors – Spotify, MixRadio, Gracenote, MusicQubed, Sheridans, MediaCom and 7digital – and we’ve got some exciting plans for the evening, which we’ll be revealing soon.

In recent weeks, we’ve been taking submissions – a free process, to cast our net wide – and convening panels of judges to come up with a shortlist for the awards’ categories. Now we can reveal who those nominees are...
